metadata.title: CVE-2023-2906 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Due to a failure in validating the length provided by an attacker-craftedCP2179 packet, Wireshark versions 2.0.0 through 4.0.7 is susceptible to adivide by zero allowing for a denial of service attack.

criterions.comment: wireshark package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
